member.name: T:Accuweather.Current.ICurrentConditions
member.summary: Get Current Conditions data for a specific location.

member.name: M:Accuweather.Current.ICurrentConditions.Get(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns current conditions data for a specific location. Current conditions searches require a location key. Please use the Locations API to obtain the location key for your desired location. By default, a truncated version of the current conditions data is returned. The full object can be obtained by passing "details=true" into the url string.
member.param: Unique ID to search for a specific location.
Boolean value specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

member.name: M:Accuweather.Current.ICurrentConditions.GetTopCities(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns current conditions data for the top 50, 100, or 150 cities worldwide, based on rank.
member.param: Integer that indicates the number to return with the request. Current supported values are 50, 100 and 150.
